title: News24.com | Lockdown: A blind couple's battle to find food in Limpopo town
description: The couple, from Zimbabwe, says they rely on money from begging outside stores to buy food and pay rent.
content:
A blind couple who mostly rely on money they get from begging outside stores in Louis Trichardt, Limpopo, are battling to make ends meet.
Willie Chimuka and Fungai Pepukai moved to South Africa from Zimbabwe in 2018. The couple has four children. Three live … [+2185 chars]
